title: My handwriting is horrid. I've tried everything, and no matter what it still just doesn't work for me. What do I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: I tried copying the whole article of a newspaper that I like or paragraphs from my favorite books and write them on a sheet of lined paper. I keep practising slowly and not in a rush until I get used to my reflexes. Another thing that I do is write “Aa” in a whole sheet of lined paper and that goes on and on until letter “Zz”. I write everything I think and feel in a scratch paper or even tissue paper. Keep practicing and write slowly until you get that hang of it. Good luck!
I work with people like you, for a living; I believe that I can help you. Please visit my web-site at HandwritingThatWorks.com
Your handwriting reflects your personality, if you meant to say your writing is illegible that could mean youre kinda secretive, just practice writing. Try engineering lettering or print letters.
